title: LF Jungle Coach

embed.description: Princêss / Silver 2 22LP / 48W 53L Win Ratio 48% / Dr. Mundo - 12W 11L Win Ratio 52%, Zac - 3W 7L Win Ratio 30%, Kha'Zix - 7W 2L Win Ratio 78%, Jax - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%, Jarvan IV - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%

body:
Just looking for some help to get out of this shit hole i've been held up in because i'm too dumb to realise my own mistakes.

But in all seriousness its my bot lane ;) nah i've been watching my replys and shit can spot some of my weakness's however I can't spot what the right thing to do would of been.

if you are of high elo please send me a f/r I have comms we could play a game or I can show you a reply whatever floats your goat.

IGN: Princêss (to get the e its alt 0234)

Thanks -

replies.body: For a start stop getting red smite and start getting green smite, warding (if done properly) helps far more than your ability to kill 1 champ slightly better, with the changes to the sightstone, you now have jnglers getting warding items first, use it, ward the enemy jng to know where they are and when they are low, this allows your team to use the bonus as well as you, ideally if you ward well, your team will not be ganked nearly as much, also it means you are not reliant on the support for all your vision and compared to someone who does take red/blue smite, you now have DOUBLE the amount of wards available, I mean im not ranked and I can't speak for anything above maybe silver (the rank of guys I often play with) but green jng items made my jngling go from mediocre to actually useful. Also try Jax, he fits your jng pool play style and is quite strong atm, other than that

I can help you out with Counter Jungling if you want, I main Mundo and I got to plat 3 using him.
1t 1t 1t 1t 1t
